title: New: Working Girls – Your Voice
body:
Having been keeping an ear out for Louisville outfit **Working Girls** for a while now, the release of his most recent track, _Your Voice_, finally pushed into deciding that he’s more than worthy of featuring on these pages.

A dark lament to a dominating lover, the synths are atramentous and foreboding, whereas the vocals are misty and overcast, yet allow the track to breathe and  develop a personality that it would otherwise be lacking. Check out _Your Voice_ below, and keep up with **Working Girls** via [Facebook](http://www.facebook.com/pages/Working-Girls/116559468416709).
